short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instant Weather Tab New Tab is the free extension for getting online weather forecast.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instant Weather Tab New Tab is a functional tool that provides detailed 5-Day weather forecast for your location, as well as an exceptional custom search experience powered by Bing.

Instant Weather Tab is a convenient extension that transforms your New Tab into a practical dashboard, displaying current time and date, weather temperature in Ð¡elsius of the city you are located in, additional details about the current city and country along with a comprehensive five-day weather forecast. Staying updated on weather conditions is crucial, and this convenient extension simplifies the process, allowing you to effortlessly track the weather. The user-friendly interface and intuitive UI are thoughtfully designed to enhance your convenience.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install "Instant Weather Tab" Chrome extension and hereby agree to set Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use. You may remove this extension at any time from the chrome extension page.

Visit our website at https://instantweathertab.com/
Read About us: https://instantweathertab.com/about-tab/
Read our Privacy Policy: https://instantweathertab.com/privacy-policy/
Read our Terms and Conditions: https://instantweathertab.com/terms-conditions/
